original_text: Then the angel who was speaking to me said, “Proclaim this word: This is what the Lord Almighty says: ‘I am very jealous for Jerusalem and Zion,
korean_text: 내게 말하는 천사가 내게 이르되 너는 외쳐 이르기를 만군의 여호와의 말씀에 내가 예루살렘을 위하며 시온을 위하여 크게 질투하며

sentences.original_text: Then the angel who was speaking to me said
This is what the Lord Almighty says:
I am very jealous for Jerusalem
